subject: Upcoming Parent-Teacher Conference
message: The Parent-Teacher Conference is scheduled for March 30th from 9 AM to 3 PM. Parents are encouraged to attend and discuss their child's progress with teachers.

subject: Midterm Exam Schedule Released
message: The midterm exam schedule is now available on the school website. Students are advised to review the schedule and prepare accordingly.

subject: School Closed for Maintenance
message: The school will be closed on April 5th for facility maintenance. Regular classes will resume on April 6th.

subject: Annual Sports Day Announcement
message: The Annual Sports Day will be held on April 15th at the school stadium. Students interested in participating should register by April 10th.

subject: New Library Books Available
message: The school library has added new books to its collection, including bestsellers and academic resources. Students are welcome to borrow them starting next week.
